subject: Pro x
description_text:
If I buy the pro x two pedal set and the control box will these hook
Right up to my asetek forte pedals or
Is there more I have to buy?

Thank you 
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Mark Bouley,  If you already have Asetek Forte pedals, do you still need to purchase our ProX pedals? If you're only interested in using our telemetry-based vibration features, you only need to purchase the ProX Ultra control box, the VAM Pro motors, and the power supply. Then, simply use them with SIMSONN Manager 2.0.9 or SIMHUB 9.9.3 to activate vibration feedback based on telemetry data.

I’m sorry lol no I don’t need the two pedal set not sure why I wrote that,
what I meant to ask was if the mount that comes with the vam pro motors
will work with the forte pedals.
Thank you

On Tue, Jul 22, 2025 at 10:54 PM support@simsonn.com
Hi Mark Bouley,  We haven't designed a dedicated bracket for it yet. It's possible that some users may release 3D-printed designs in the future, as the demand for it is relatively low.
